62 typedef struct {

81 #define UIBUTTON(name) \
82  bool uibuttons_get_##name(void); \
83  uibutton_t name = {uibuttons_get_##name}; \
84  bool uibuttons_get_##name(void)
85 
86 #define EXTERN_UIBUTTON(name) \
87  extern uibutton_t name
88 
89 #define UIBUTTONS(...) \
90  const uibutton_t *uibuttons[] = { __VA_ARGS__ }; \
91  const unsigned uibuttons_count = sizeof(uibuttons)/sizeof(uibuttons[0]);
92 
93 #define UIBUTTONS_COUNT uibuttons_count
94 
95 #define UIBUTTONS_GET_ID(button) \
96  ((int)(button-uibuttons))
97 
98 #define UIBUTTONS_POLL_SINGLE(id) \
99  uibuttons_poll(uibuttons[id])
100 
101 #define UIBUTTONS_POLL_ALL() \
102  do{int tmp;for(tmp=0;tmp<UIBUTTONS_COUNT;tmp++)UIBUTTONS_POLL_SINGLE(tmp);}while(0)
103 
104 #define UIBUTTONS_INIT_ALL() \
105  do{int tmp;for(tmp=0;tmp<UIBUTTONS_COUNT;tmp++)uibuttons[tmp]->prev_state=uibuttons[tmp]->get();}while(0)
106 
107 void uibuttons_poll(uibutton_t *button);
